mapper.insert: insert into tb_drug(drug_name, drug_trade_name, drug_no, drug_unit, drug_price) values(#{drugName}, #{drugTradeName}, #{drugNo}, #{drugUnit}, #{drugPrice})
mapper.select: select drug_id, drug_name, drug_trade_name, drug_no, drug_unit, drug_price from tb_drug where drug_name = #{drugName} and is_deleted = 0
select drug_id, drug_name, drug_trade_name, drug_no, drug_unit, drug_price from tb_drug where drug_id = #{drugId} and is_deleted = 0

select drug_id, drug_name, drug_trade_name, drug_no, drug_unit, drug_price, create_time from tb_drug where is_deleted = 0 and ( drug_trade_name like CONCAT('%', #{drugTradeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or drug_name like CONCAT('%', #{drugTradeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') ) order by drug_id desc
limit #{start},#{limit}

select count(*) from tb_drug where is_deleted = 0 and ( drug_trade_name like CONCAT('%', #{drugTradeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or drug_name like CONCAT('%', #{drugTradeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') )

select d.drug_id, d.drug_name, d.drug_trade_name, d.drug_no, d.drug_unit, d.drug_price, d.create_time,(i.input_num - ifnull((select sum(output_num) from tb_output o where o.input_id = i.input_id and o.is_deleted = 0 group by o.input_id),0) - ifnull((select sum(wastage_num) from tb_wastage w where w.input_id = i.input_id and w.is_deleted = 0 group by w.input_id),0) ) as reckon_num, i.duration from tb_drug as d left join tb_input i on d.drug_id = i.drug_id and i.is_deleted = 0 and duration > date(now()) and i.input_num > ifnull((select sum(output_num) from tb_output o where o.input_id = i.input_id and o.is_deleted = 0 group by o.input_id),0) where ( drug_trade_name like CONCAT('%', #{drugTradeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or drug_name like CONCAT('%', #{drugTradeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') ) order by d.drug_id desc
limit #{start},#{limit}

select count(*) from tb_drug as d left join tb_input i on d.drug_id = i.drug_id and i.is_deleted = 0 and duration > date(now()) and i.input_num > ifnull((select sum(output_num) from tb_output o where o.input_id = i.input_id and o.is_deleted = 0 group by o.input_id),0) where ( drug_trade_name like CONCAT('%', #{drugTradeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or drug_name like CONCAT('%', #{drugTradeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') ) order by d.drug_id desc
select drug_id, drug_name, drug_trade_name, drug_no, drug_unit, drug_price, create_time from tb_drug where is_deleted = 0 order by drug_id desc
mapper.update: update tb_drug set is_deleted = 1 where drug_id = #{drugId} and is_deleted = 0
